column2: Do you prefer reading to cards? said he; "that is rather singular."
column3: Do you prefer reading to cards? said he; "that is rather singular."

column2: She is now about Miss Elizabeth Bennet's height, or rather taller."

column2: Yes, all of them, I think.	Yes, all of them, I think.
